headline: Honeywell Accelerates Aerospace Spin Off To Sharpen Automation Focus
summary: Honeywell International (NasdaqGS:HON) is accelerating the planned spin off of its Aerospace division. The company is also classifying Productivity Solutions and Warehouse and Workflow Solutions as assets held for sale. These moves mark a clear shift toward industrial automation and portfolio optimization. Honeywell is a large diversified industrial group, with businesses that span aerospace, building technologies, and automation focused offerings. By fast tracking the Aerospace separation...
